english: Please allow me to offer you my apologies .
chinese: 请允许我向各位表示歉意。

english: Will you do it for me as a personal favor ?
chinese: 请你帮我个人一个忙行吗？

english: Would you kindly make an exception for us this time ?
He consulted his physician about his health .
chinese: 他请医生诊断他的健康。

english: Do not run away -- i want your advice .
chinese: 请不要走我需要你的意见。
请造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I asked him to set a value on the pictures ..
chinese: 我请他对这些画估个价。

english: Will the next witness please take the stand ?
chinese: 请下一位证人出庭作证。

english: Please let me know when you 're ready to go .
chinese: 你走的时候请关照一声。

english: Pray tell me in what way i can reward you .
chinese: 请告诉我怎样酬答你才好。

english: I need to get your slant on the situation .
chinese: 请说说您对于情况的意见。

english: Please pass this parcel on to teacher li .
chinese: 请把这个包裹转交给李老师。

english: Please give me a moment to collect my thoughts .
Please retell the fairy story in english .
chinese: 请用英语复述这篇童话故事。

english: You may ask rivers to show you the ropes .
chinese: 你可以请里弗斯教你诀窍。
